Package com.qoretechnologies.qorus.test

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRemoteDbSelectAction
    Selects one or more rows from a remote table in a remote Qorus instance
    Action
    Abstract class representing an action in a test case
    CallService
    Call a Qorus service method
    CallSoapMethod
    This class will invoke a SOAP operation and optionally check the response If the response is not known in advance:
    CheckDbTableRow
    Abstract class representing an action in a test case
    CheckDbTableRows
    Abstract class representing an action in a test case
    CheckFileCsv
    Abstract class representing an action in a test case
    CheckFileNonexisting
    Abstract class representing an action in a test case
    CheckFileText
    Abstract class representing an action in a test case
    CheckLog
    Abstract class representing an action in a test case
    CheckRunningWorkflow
    This class will ensure a workflow is running
    CreateFile
    Action class to create a file as an input for an interface
    CreateFileCsv
    Action class to create a csv file as an input for an interface
    CreateFileText
    Action class to create a file as an input for an interface
    CreateOrder
    This class will create a workflow order
    DeleteDbTableData
    Deletes one or more rows from a DB table
    ExecSynchronousOrder
    This class will create and execute a synchronous workflow order
    FindOrderByKey
    Finds a workflow order using a key and value.
    InsertDbTableRows
    Inserts one or more rows into DB table
    InsertRemoteDbTableRows
    Inserts one or more rows into a remote table in a remote Qorus instance
    QorusInterfaceTest
    Base class that exports functions for Qorus interface testing
    QorusJobTest
    Base class for testing Qorus services
    QorusPassiveWorkflowTest
    Base class for testing Qorus workflows without starting any workflow execution instances
    QorusServiceTest
    Base class for testing Qorus services
    QorusWorkflowTest
    Base class for testing Qorus workflows
    RemoteDbDeleteAction
    Deletes one of more rows from a remote table in a remote Qorus instance
    RemoteDbSelectAction
    Selects data from a remote DB and compares to expected data
    RunJob
    This class will run the current job; must be used with QorusJobTest tests
    RunJobResult
    This class will run the current job and compares the result status and optionally job instance information; must be used with QorusJobTest tests
    Sleep
    Sleep action
    StartLog
    Abstract class representing an action in a test case
    TruncateTable
    Clears the given table
    UnblockOrder
    This class will unblock an order and verify its status after unblocking
    UpsertRemoteDbTableRows
    Upserts (ie performs an SQL merge operation) one or more rows into a remote table in a remote Qorus instance
    WaitForWfiid
    This class will wait for a workflow order to reach a final status (COMPLETE, ERROR, or CANCELED)
